the White House and Congress. On Dec. 10, Sen. Bernie Sanders , an independent, took the floor of the Senate and didn't relinquish it for 8 1/2 hours. His words are being assembled into a book entitled The Speech: A Historic Filibuster on Corporate Greed and the Decline of Our Middle Class. at one of Britain's sauciest tabloids. The aide, Andy Coulson , had edited News of the World, Britain's biggest-selling Sunday newspaper, until 2007 and shortly after was hired by David Cameron . Unfortunately continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110 per cent needed in this role, Andy Coulson said in a statement. The resignation is a blow for David Cameron , who had repeatedly backed Andy Coulson against calls for his resignation, saying earlier this week that everyone deserved a "second chance."

Cam Newton appeared on "The Late Show with David Letterman " two days after winning the Heisman Trophy and made a memorable appearance on "The Tonight Show" earlier this week. When you look at a guy that a year ago nobody knew who he was, obviously, and you look at just what he's done, it's a great story, coach Gene Chizik said earlier this week.
